purseData.desc: Crafted from candy pink soft shiny calf leather, the small BON BON Bucket has a sculptural shape defined by a drawstring fastening and light gold hardware. Carry in hand using the leather and metal bracelet top handle consistent with the BON BON family, or use the adjustable and detachable leather strap to wear on the shoulder or cross-body.  Shiny calf leather Leather and metal top handle Drawstring closure Interior pocket Bag measures: L17 x H17.5 x W11cm Adjustable and detachable leather strap measures: 47cm Made in Italy By purchasing this product, you are supporting sustainable leather manufacturing through the Leather Working Groupundefined

Double carry bag in grained calfskin Carry: hand & long shoulder or cross-body  - 1 Roomy compartment - 1 Front slip pocket hidden by the flap - 1 Internal zippered pocket - Removable leather strap - Antique gold finishing - Linen lining Comes with a dust bag  - Width: 14.2” (36 cm) - Height: 11.0" (28 cm) - Depth: 4.7" (12 cm) - Min. strap drop: 18.1" (46 cm) - Max. strap drop: 21.6” (55 cm)  This double carry bag is made from semi-aniline leather. Tanning imparts a specific character to the skin, such as hues and wrinkles, combined with a light and transparent aniline finish. Respect care instructions on the leaflet.  To make this product, Chloe worked with Leather Working Group (LWG) certified leather manufacturers. LWG certifies tanneries based on their water and energy usage, management of chemicals, solid waste, and wastewater.
